name: originative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
new and original, or able to make something that is new or original: She is known as an originative musical genius who keeps putting out recordings that sound nothing like her previous work. The gallery show is well curated, highlighting the originative vision of each participating artist.
More examplesFewer examplesThe teacher was lauded for her originative ability to keep her students engaged. The company encourages its engineers to create originative designs rather than sticking to the old way of doing things.
